name: roar
effect: Switches the target out for another of its trainer’s Pokémon selected at random. Wild battles end immediately. Doesn’t affect Pokémon with suction cups or under the effect of ingrain.
short_effect: Immediately ends wild battles. Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The target is scared off, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The target is scared off, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The target is scared off, and a different Pokémon is dragged out.
